hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Liquidity Rotation on BTC Dominance Rejection
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC.D (dominance) tests 52% resistance while ETH/BTC ratio is at 30-day lows and total altcoin volume/BTC volume ratio >1.5, subsequent BTC.D rejection triggers mean reversion favoring large-cap alts (SOL, AVAX) over 5-day horizon.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Traders overweight BTC during uncertainty; dominance resistance + elevated alt volume signals latent rotation demand. ETH/BTC at lows provides valuation cushion.
entry_conditions: Altcoin aggregate volume / BTC volume >1.5 for 2 consecutive days
BTC.D rejects resistance with >1% daily red candle

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH/BTC ratio reaches 30-day mean (0.0348) OR 5 days elapsed

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC.D breaks out above 52.5% (continuation, not rotation) or alt volume collapses post-rejection.
